abstract.p: Bell Atlantic will allow residents and businesses near border of Westchester and Putnam Counties to use both new 845 and old 914 area codes until December (S)

block.p: Northern Westchester residents and businesses will not have a new 845 area code, but customers near the border of Westchester and Putnam Counties can be reached -- until December only -- by dialing either 914 or 845, John Bonomo, a Bell Atlantic spokesman, said last Wednesday. In December, the phone company's equipment will formally switch over to the new system and the confusion will end, Mr. Bonomo said. Last October, the State Public Service Commission split the 914 area to create more numbers for a growing telecommunication need.
